saying: You need the sour to highlight the sweet.
description: Ellie is a normal, elephant villager from the Animal Crossing series. She first appeared in Doubutsu no Mori. Following more than a decade of absence, she made a reappearance in Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo. Her name comes from the first part of the word elephant. Ellie's catchphrase "wee one" is shared with Dotty in Animal Crossing. In Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo, this was changed to "li'l one" to avoid confusion.
